title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka - Kasulaperu Design Earrings
materials: High-quality Gold Plating over Alloy base
Faceted Emerald Green CZ Stones (American Diamonds)
Seed Pearls. Features durable and lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced shine.
features: Classic bell-shaped Jhumka design with intricate filigree work. Adorned with floral motifs featuring sparkling Emerald Green CZ stones, complemented by delicate seed pearl drops. Open work design to enhance light and sparkle.
occasions: traditional functions such as Seemantham and Half-Saree functions
or as a statement piece for any festive occasion. Also suitable for modern evening wear adding a touch of heritage.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship combined with timeless design. The Emerald Green CZ stones bring a vibrant touch, while the seed pearls add a classic elegance. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, making it ideal for long celebrations. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. Makes a meaningful and cherished gift reflecting rich South Indian heritage.
